description: Creates and populates a subjects directory for use with recon-all from SAMSEG outputs.

samseg_dir.title: Samseg Directory
samseg_dir.description: Output directory from samseg or samseg-long. Defaults to subject/mri/samseg if not supplied

no_cc.title: No Corpus Callosum Segmentation
no_cc.description: Do not do corpus callosum segmentation

fill.title: Use Samseg Fill
fill.description: Use samseg to create the filled.mgz used for tessellation

long_tp.title: Longitudinal Time Point
long_tp.description: Process specific time point (TP) number from samsegdir

base.title: Process Base
base.description: Process base, will find folder called base in samsegdir

mask_file.title: Brain Mask File
mask_file.description: Use provided mask as brainmask instead of computing from seg

from_recon_all.title: Execution from Recon-all
from_recon_all.description: Indicates execution from recon-all, preventing overwrite of rawavg.mgz and orig.mgz

force_update.title: Force Update
force_update.description: Force update of the subject directory
